item.title: CVE-2024-28167|2024-04-09T00:55:46.326Z -- SAP_SE -- SAP Group Reporting Data Collection (Enter Package Data)
item.description: SAP Group Reporting Data CollectionÂ does not perform necessary authorization checks for an authenticated user, resulting in escalation of privileges. On successful exploitation, specific data can be changed via the Enter Package Data app although the user does not have sufficient authorization causing high impact on Integrity of the appliction.
